content:
This is really unfortunate, especially for those who have to review and reconcile the issues:
image.png
It' won't let me submit unless I delete the "Related URL"
I've raised this in the JIRA/Confluence stream: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/184932-JIRA.2FConfluence/topic/CQL.20Doesn't.20Allow.20Related.20URLs
Hoping there's something I just didn't set up correctly in the CQL project description in JIRA.
No. Right now, the list of allowed URLs is hard-coded. We want to move to a place where it's not, but we're not there yet. I'll fix this today.
